channel.title: Art Installations on Disorient presents: COUNTRY CLUB XIV - PRESENCE AND THE ETERNAL NOW
channel.description: Recent content in Art Installations on Disorient presents: COUNTRY CLUB XIV - PRESENCE AND THE ETERNAL NOW

item.title: Pyramid On The Sea
item.description: Experience a mesmerizing illuminated pyramid installation floating on the lake, creating a magical focal point for nighttime contemplation.

item.title: The Thirteenth
item.description:
This temple is made of thirteen wooden octahedra to commemorate Country Club’s thirteenth edition. This is the first time we include Zero Gravity Chairs in an actual Geodesic Temple.

The temple will be burned at sunset on Sunday, approximately 8pm.
